meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be removed.
meanings.sent1: The removablenesses of the sticker made it easy to peel off.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the removablenesses of the Velcro on my shoes.
meanings.sent3: The removablenesses of the fake mustache led to a hilarious mix-up at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a certain removablenesses, as if it could be wiped away in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The removablenesses of the stain on the tablecloth made it seem like magic to remove.

meanings.sent1: The removablenesses of the battery allowed for easy replacement.
meanings.sent2: The removablenesses of the cover made cleaning the blender a breeze.
meanings.sent3: His forgetfulness reached new heights when he misplaced the removablenesses of his keys.
meanings.sent4: The removablenesses of the clouds in the sky reminded her of changing circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The removablenesses of the bandage revealed the healing wound underneath.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being easily taken away.
meanings.sent1: The removablenesses of the snow from the driveway required a shovel.
meanings.sent2: The removablenesses of the label left no residue on the jar.
meanings.sent3: The removablenesses of the cat from the tree was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The removablenesses of doubt from her mind brought clarity to the situation.
meanings.sent5: The removablenesses of the scent from the room left it feeling fresh and clean.
